data.name: Birthday Cake
data.description: All of the best parts of a birthday party pack themselves into one delectable pint of Birthday Cake ice cream. A nostalgic twist with rainbow sprinkles with an additional 20 grams of protein per pint, you’ll enjoy every bite without having to sing Happy Birthday. And at 280 calories per pint, we aren’t blaming you.

data.name: Black Cherry
data.description: They say the rich just get richer and in this case, they’re right. Because with only 280 calories per pint, even the apprehensive black cherry ice cream fans will be excited to dig in. Plus with 20 grams of protein per pint, there’s nothing to be apprehensive about!

data.name: Blueberry Crumble
data.description: Swirls of sweet blueberry pie filling and chunks of pie crust, our Blueberry Crumble ice cream delivers the best of spring with an additional 20 grams of protein in one pint. Satisfy your sweet tooth with a pint of Blueberry Crumble that’s just 360 calories per pint.

data.name: Candy Bar
data.description: Indulge in your candy cravings with this delectable chocolate, candy bar ice cream that has a filling 20 grams of protein per pint. Bits of peanuts and caramel swirls all for only 360 per pint.

data.name: Caramel Macchiato
data.description: There’s nothing like the smell of espresso in the morning. Now you can get your coffee fix in this rich pint of caramel macchiato ice cream with real ribbons of caramel at just 280 calories per pint.

data.name: Chocolate
data.description: Chocolate ice cream is a known cure to many of life’s problems. You’ll have no issue unravelling your troubles inside this scrumptious Chocolate pint with only 320 calories and a boost of 20 grams of protein.

data.name: Chocolate Covered Banana
data.description: As straightforward as its name, our Chocolate Covered Banana ice cream brings a classic summer treat to year-long enjoyment with a boost of 20 grams per pint. It’s a summer treat you can enjoy all year long as it’s only 320 calories per pint!

data.name: Chocolate Mocha Chip
data.description: What more do you need in life besides chocolate and coffee? This power couple of chocolate mocha ice cream is complete with mocha chips and 20 grams of protein per pint that has coffee aficionados reaching for more. Plus at only 320 calories per pint, what’s not to love?

data.name: Chocolate Almond Crunch
data.description: Almond lovers rejoice! This creamy concoction of chocolate almond ice cream packs a lot of delicious flavor, all at only 320 calories per pint. And with 20 grams of protein, you’ll feel good about getting your almond fix.

data.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
data.description: No need to sneak raw cookie dough off the spoon–this pint of creamy vanilla ice cream with real chunks of cookie dough and 20 grams of protein per pint has got you covered. Even better, our Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream is only 360 calories per pint so you can go ahead and lick the spoon.

data.name: Cookies & Cream
data.description: Who doesn’t love cookies and cream ice cream, especially when it comes with 20 grams of protein per pint? Inside our Cookies & Cream, you’ll enjoy every last bite at only 320 calories per pint.

data.name: Gingerbread House
data.description: No crafting required to enjoy Halo Top’s Gingerbread House ice cream! Filled with cinnamon and gingerbread cookie chunks, this is a treat that can be enjoyed all holiday season long at 360 calories per pint.

data.name: Key Lime Pie
data.description: The refreshing and perfect-amount-of-tart lime is mixed with real crunchy pie crust pieces for a delicious summertime treat with 20 grams of protein and 360 calories per pint.

data.name: Lemon Cake
data.description: With just the right amount of tang and creamy flavor, a pint of Lemon Cake ice cream soothes the soul with the help of 20 grams of protein per pint. Fresh and bright but not too acidic, this delicious pint is only 280 calories per pint.

data.name: Mint Chip
data.description: Inside our Mint Chip ice cream, the fresh taste of mint is best accompanied by rich chocolate chips and is only enhanced by 20 grams of protein per pint. Together, the three are unstoppable at only 320 calories per pint.

data.name: Oatmeal Cookie
data.description: We’re giving Oatmeal ice cream the love it deserves. Have all of the flavor of fresh-out-of-the-oven cookies at only 280 calories per pint. Plus, did we mention it’s packed with 20 grams of protein per pint?

data.name: Peaches & Cream
data.description: Some things are meant to be together, like peaches and cream. Indulge in the sweet flavor of peach ice cream balanced only by delicious creamy flavor for only 320 calories per pint

data.name: Peanut Butter & Jelly
data.description: Delivering nostalgia in a pint by serving up peanut butter ice cream swirled with strawberry and sprinkled with cannoli bites with 20 grams of protein and 360 calories per pint.

data.name: Peanut Butter Cup
data.description: This pint of peanut butter and chocolate deliciousness is a home-run to any Peanut Butter Cup ice cream lover. Boasting only 320 calories and packed with 20 grams of protein for the whole pint, enjoy this fan-favorite without the guilt that otherwise comes along with your favorite treat.

data.name: Pistachio
data.description: Pistachios are a time-consuming nut, so we thought we’d do you a favor by doing all of the hard work for you in this pistachio ice cream while adding an additional 20 grams of protein per pint. At only 280 calories per pint, and no hard work, you might as well crack it open.

data.name: Pumpkin Pie
data.description: Satisfy your pumpkin cravings with Halo Top’s Pumpkin Pie ice cream! Filled with creamy pumpkin ice cream and packed with crunchy graham cracker pieces, this delicious pint is just 360 calories making it possible to indulge all season long.

data.name: Rainbow Swirl
data.description: This gluten-free rainbow ice cream pint comes packed with 3 flavors: raspberry, orange and lime, all swirled together to perfection with 20 grams of protein per pint. And did we mention that it’s only 280 calories per pint?

data.name: Red Velvet
data.description: The world’s most decadent dessert just got sweeter and stronger with 20 grams of protein per pint. Our Red Velvet ice cream is filled with bite-sized brownie pieces but only 360 calories per pint, so you’ll never want this pint to come to an end.

data.name: S'mores
data.description: Trade in your stick for a spoon and together, let’s forget about camping. Our S’more ice cream is full of marshmallow graham cracker chocolate goodness—you won’t even believe that it’s only 320 calories per pint.

data.name: Sea Salt Caramel
data.description: Proof that opposites attract, Sea Salt Caramel ice cream delivers the best of both sweet and savory into one scrumptious flavor. Inside of this 320 calorie pint, you’ll get 20 grams of protein making it a guilt-free treat.

data.name: Strawberry
data.description: There’s nothing basic about a great pint of strawberry ice cream that has 20 grams of protein per pint. Enjoy this brightly flavored classic at only 280 calories per pint.

data.name: Vanilla Bean
data.description: A true testimony that vanilla ice cream doesn’t mean boring, Vanilla Bean brings a seamless paradox of simplicity and elegance in one deliciously creamy pint. Complete with 20 grams of protein and only 280 calories, you’ll want to visit this classic flavor again and again.

data.name: Birthday Cake
data.description: Celebrate like it’s your birthday with this delightful, birthday cake inspired dairy-free frozen dessert. It’s filled with bright rainbow sprinkles and only 280 calories per pint!

data.name: Candy Bar
data.description: A rewarding dairy-free frozen dessert with a chocolate base is filled with bits of peanuts and caramel swirls. Plus, with 12 grams of protein and 360 calories per pint, you’ll feel extra rewarded.

data.name: Caramel Macchiato
data.description: Giving you a reason to get out of bed in the morning, this dairy-free frozen dessert provides your coffee fix with real ribbons of caramel at just 320 calories per pint.

data.name: Chocolate
data.description: Nothing beats the classic taste of chocolate—especially when this rich, dairy-free frozen dessert is only 280 calories per pint!

data.name: Chocolate Almond Crunch
data.description: This dairy-free frozen dessert is filled with chocolatey almond goodness and is only 280 calories per pint. Plus, with 12 grams of protein, you’ll feel like rewarding yourself more often.

data.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
data.description: Dig into creamy, delicious, dairy-free vanilla frozen dessert that’s filled with chunks of cookie dough. At only 360 calories per pint, you’re going to want to lick the spoon.

data.name: Chocolate Hazelnut
data.description: Complete with dreamy hazelnut swirls, this pint offers up a chocolate lover’s dream at only 320 calories per pint.

data.name: Chocolate Peppermint Crunch
data.description: Halo Top’s vegan, dairy-free Chocolate Peppermint Crunch pint sets a festive tone for the holiday season with a rich peppermint chocolate base swirled with chocolate and packed with peppermint pieces. With 320 calories per pint, you’ll enjoy this flavor all season long!

data.name: Mint Fudge Cookie
data.description: Taste the complementary flavors of chocolate and mint in our delicious non-dairy pint. Our crisp chocolate mint ice cream is balanced by indulgent fudge swirls and cookie crumbles. Altogether, this non-dairy pint is only only 320 calories and a whopping 20 grams of protein.

data.name: Oatmeal Cookie
data.description: Save baking for another day. Enjoy all of the flavor of an oatmeal cookie in a delicious, dairy-free frozen dessert that’s just 280 calories per pint.

data.name: Peanut Butter & Jelly
data.description: Dive into this dairy-free peanut butter frozen dessert swirled with strawberry jam and sprinkled with cannoli bites for only 360 calories per pint.

data.name: Peanut Butter Cup
data.description: Rich peanut butter and chocolate pair together deliciously in this dairy-free frozen dessert that’s only 320 calories per pint. Even better, it also boasts 12 grams of protein per pint!

data.name: Pumpkin Pie
data.description: Now everyone can have their pie and eat it too with Halo Top’s vegan, dairy-free Pumpkin Pie frozen dessert! This seasonal favorite, now in a dairy-free version, is filled with creamy pumpkin frozen dessert and packed with crunchy graham cracker bits all for 360 calories per pint!

data.name: Sea Salt Caramel
data.description: Sweet and savory in one delicious, dairy-free frozen dessert that’s only 320 calories per pint. Even better, it packs in 12 grams of protein per pint.

data.name: Toasted Coconut
data.description: Take a load off, kick back and enjoy the taste of crisp, refreshing coconut with a sweet twist. This rich, dairy-free frozen dessert contains real coconut flakes throughout, all for only 320 calories for the entire pint.

data.name: Vanilla Maple
data.description: Giving you a reason to get out of bed in the morning, this dairy-free frozen dessert provides your coffee fix with real ribbons of caramel at just 280 calories per pint.

data.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Pops
data.description: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Pops take the classic comfort of cookie dough chunks and chocolate chips conveniently packed into a vanilla Pop, at just 50 calories per Pop.

data.name: Mint Chip Pops
data.description: Bringing together the refreshing taste of mint ice cream with delicious chooclate chips. Mint Chip Pops pack perfect crunch into every bite at just 50 calories per Pop!

data.name: Peanut Butter Swirl Pops
data.description: Packing all of the flavor of one of our most popular pints, Peanut Butter Cup, into a perfectly portioned pop complete with a silky peanut butter swirl. Plus, these Peanut Butter Swirl Pops are snackable at just 60 calories per Pop.

data.name: Strawberry Cheesecake Pops
data.description: Strawberry Cheesecake Pops are filled with our delicious strawberry cheesecake–flavored ice cream and are perfected by a mouthwatering graham cracker swirl. Perfect for those who want to have their (cheese) cake and eat it too for just 60 calories per Pop!
